creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: front view of somewhat rotund woman clutching decorated black kimono in PR hand and holding white origami crane in PL hand; woman appears within round vignette against brilliant red background; pink and green lips, white nose, and high, painted eyebrows
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

LRQ: [ 福女　還暦賀筆百福女之一　綾岡有真 ]
title: Otafuku
